description.message: Multiple label and account notifier for Google Mail (Gmail), and more!

bg_check_new_emails.message: Checking for new emails. Please wait...

pp_mark_all_as_read.message: Mark all messages for this query as read

pp_mark_as_read_title.message: Mark as read (Shift + KeyI), or Mark as unread (Shift + KeyU)

pp_search.message: Type a query and hit the Enter key (e.g. is:unread label:inbox)

pp_notification.message: Add or remove notification for the current query and remember this query when the interface is open. Each email address needs to have at least one active notification query, or the default query is used. To ignore an email address from getting notification alerts, use the ignore list from the options page. To prevent a query from contributing to the badge counter, prepend it with the "[silent]" keyword.

pp_expand.message: Toggle between collapsed and expanded modes

pp_no_user.message: {EMAIL} user is not logged-in or its account cannot be accessed.

pp_view.message: Toggle between single or four grid views

op_default_page_desc.message: Click on the action button opens this page when there are no unread emails

op_ignored_users_desc.message: Comma-separated list of logged-in email addresses to ignore when updating badge

op_mark_as_read_desc.message: Automatically mark the email as read when viewing it

op_csp_desc.message: Use this content security policy for viewing emails. For instance to prevent the viewer from loading any remote resources use "default-src 'none'; style-src 'unsafe-inline';" (without quotes), or to allow all the remote resources, empty the box

op_notification_sound.message: Whether to play a sound notification when you got a new email or not

op_notification_desktop.message: Whether to show a desktop notification when you got a new email or not

op_notification_source_title.message: A number that represents the sound's source. Use 0, 1, 2, or 3 for the default sounds

op_msg_large_file.message: This file is to big! Please reduce the filesize and retry.

op_msg_sound_id.message: Use '%%' as the souce id of this sound
